name: Retro Ravagers
description:
Shoot, Run, Kill!

Retro Ravagers is a retraux/cartoony zombie shooter!  Survive as wave after wave of zombies crash upon you and hold out for as long as you can. Every hit counts, there's no way to get your health back after it's gone, so be careful! 

Fight those fiends in the Courtyard of Carnage. Best your friends by racking up a higher score!

Credits:

Arongranberg for the great A* Pathfinding script:

https://arongranberg.com/astar/

Garth for the Wave Spawning script:

www.CorruptedHeart.co.cc

Music is Dark Man and Napalm Man stages from the Megaman series. 

The remixes of both these tracks are by:

Scraphobius:

https://soundcloud.com/maskelad/dark-man-stage-2014

Synthescissor:

Thank you for playing!
